pageContent: Background: Magnetic resonance imaging-guided transurethral ultrasound ablation (MRI-TULSA) is a novel minimally invasive technology for ablating prostate tissue, potentially offering good disease control of localized cancer and low morbidity.

metaData.source:
Local control of prostate cancer by transrectal HIFU-therapy
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/11221062/
